text: How do I log an exception at warning- or info-level with trace back using the python logging framework?

code:
try:
   #Something...
except BaseException, excep:
   logger = logging.getLogger("componet")
   logger.warning("something raised an exception: " + excep)
   logger.info("something raised an exception: " + excep)

text: I would rather not have it on the error-level cause in my special case it is not an error.
At least not in that python-process.
